Package com.parkingtycoon.controllers

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    InputController.KeyListener  
    InputController.MouseListener  
    InputController.ScrollListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimatedSpritesController
    This class is responsible for loading Animated Sprite Data from JSON files to usable AnimatedSpriteModels.
    BaseController
    This class is responsible for adding the responsibilities of a Controller in the MVC architecture.
    BluePrintsController
    The responsibility of this controller is to build and demolish buildings using the information of the BluePrints and the input of the player.
    CarQueuesController
    This class is responsible for adding and sending cars to an appropriate queue.
    CarsController
    This class is responsible for controlling the Cars in the simulation.
    ElevatorsController
    This controller is responsible for processing cars through elevators.
    EntrancesController
    This class is responsible for providing a Queue that processes the new Cars that would like to park.
    ExitsController
    This class is responsible for providing a Queue that processes the Cars that would like to leave the park.
    FinancialController
    This class is responsible for processing the money of the player.
    FloorsController
    This class is responsible for providing multiple floors of te simulation world.
    InputController
    This Class is responsible for processing user input like keyboard and mouse input that are applied to the GameWindow
    PathFollowersController<T extends PathFollowerModel>
    This class is responsible for making PathFollowers follow a path, using goals and elevators.
    RenderController
    This Class is responsible for enabling Views to be called every frame.
    SimulationController
    This Class is responsible for enabling Controllers to be called multiple times per frame depending on the speed of the simulation.
    TimeController
    This Class is responsible for enabling Controllers to be called every time when a amount of in game time has passes.
    UpdatableController
    This Class provides help to the Update loop to force only Controllers to be registrable.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TimeController.TimeUpdate
    All the TimeFrame Options
